products.title: Bari Spc Coconut - Roller Blind
products.description: Perfect for generating a sophisticated and tasteful dcor scheme, the bari spc in coconut features a sumptuous cream shade and luxurious detail. The fine stitching and threads create a subtle and modest texture with a luxury effect and tons of compelling style. Showcase the coconut in your lounge or dining room to form a classy and refined effect with plush fabrics and humble colour. Blend this exquisite cream tone with lavish fabrics and soft furnishings in similar neutral tones, adding golden embroidery and gilded features to finish the look with a touch of luxe.

products.title: Bari Spc Manatee - Roller Blind
products.description: Feature the bari spc in manatee within your home for a substantial blind that is both attractive and functional. The innovative solar protective coating contained in this popular range helps to maintain a comfortable temperature within the room by reflecting the sun's heat. And all with a contemporary, cool grey finish to accommodate any surrounding. For a teenager's bedroom, complement the manatee with a white and cobalt surrounding, forming a modern-day palette with a distinct style.

products.title: Bari Spc Governor Bay - Roller Blind
products.description: For a colourful and creative blind, choose the bari spc in governor bay, showcasing a punchy cobalt shade and individualistic detailing. The dainty stitching and illusive threads help to create a modest yet eye-catching pattern with compelling texture and modern style. Use the contemporary governor bay within a teenager's bedroom for a distinctive feature full of captivating colour. Create a modern scheme with a milder background of white and dusky grey, including cobalt and slate grey fabrics and furnishings to form a continual dcor arrangement with bolder features.

products.title: Bari Spc Cararra - Roller Blind
products.description: For a sophisticated look with practical benefits, opt for the popular bari spc in cararra. This exquisite cloth features a unique solar protective coating which helps to keep the room cool by reflecting the sun's heat. The dainty stitching creates a captivating texture, providing an elegant window display perfect for any room in the home. Feature the cararra in your master bedroom, layering with plush golden hues and honeyed fabrics to create an enthralling dcor scheme with warm and welcoming tones.

products.title: Bari Spc Tuscany - Roller Blind
products.description: The bari spc collection is an attractive as well as practical range of quality blinds, with an invaluable solar protective coating. Feature the tuscany edition within any room to produce an elegant window display that also helps to maintain a cool and comfortable temperature throughout the summer months. Present the tuscany in your master bedroom for a sophisticated dcor scheme with punchy colour and compelling texturing.

products.title: Bari Spc Sienna - Roller Blind
products.description: Feature the charming bari spc in sienna within your home, offering a unique solar protective coating that helps to keep a constant, comfortable temperature. By reflecting the sun before it enters the room, this beneficial property is ideal for a south-facing room, whilst also providing a sophisticated window display. Transform your master bedroom into a peaceful and classy haven by incorporating the sienna with a complementing palette of taupe, caramel, and chocolate.

products.title: Bari Spc Astra - Roller Blind
products.description: Ideal for a south-facing room, the revolutionary bari spc in astra contains a valuable solar protective coating, which reflects the sun and helps to maintain a constant, comfortable temperature. This exquisite cream shade is sure to add a compelling effect, with its modest sense of style and distinctive texturing. Transform your lounge into a serene haven by including the astra with an array of neutral and modest tones.

products.title: Bari Spc Perano - Roller Blind
products.description: Feature the contemporary bari spc in perano within your home for a burst of soothing cornflower blue with a refreshing quality and modern style. The contrast of the blind's substantial texture and subtle shade creates a distinctive look that offers chic style and, due to its simple rolling mechanism, functional practicality. Breathe life and light into a modern, all-white kitchen by including the perano.

products.title: Origin Deluxe Solitaire - Venetian Blind
products.description: The origin deluxe range has been expanded to included solitaire: a natural and gentle blend of white and light grey that flows into your home to create a unique homely visual. By combining bespoke craft with a natural tone, every slat brings an air of relaxation that will instantly make you and your guests feel at home. Origin deluxe, solitaire - venetian blind the origin deluxe range has been expanded to included solitaire: a natural and gentle blend of white and light grey that flows into your home to create a unique homely visual.

products.title: Origin Deluxe African Blackwood - Venetian Blind
products.description: The ultimate in luxury, the origin deluxe african blackwood offers all of the style and functionality of the standard range, yet with a cool, designer look, with its thick louvres and sleek, jet black finish. And, as well as a matching pelmet and rail, it comes with coordinated, high quality ladder tapes. There is no colour combination more glamorous than that of black and gold, so embrace the luxe and pair the two tones together in a contemporary dining room.

products.title: Infusion Asc Saffron Perfect Fit
products.description: Infusion asc saffron perfect fit pleated blind. Part of their infusion asc range, where advanced solar control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The asc refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the summer and retaining heat in the winter.

products.title: Amor White Lotus With Haze Soft Grey Double Roller Blind
products.description: Combining two of their most popular roller blinds in one, this amor white lotus and haze soft grey double roller blind gives you the best of both worlds. Keep the voile down in the day for light and privacy, then at night lower the blackout amor soft grey to block out the light. Their double roller blinds give you total control and practicality, with both blinds installed on the same bracket you won't need to worry about installing twice.

products.title: Zambezi 25mm Cloud Real Wood Perfect Fit Blind
products.description: A soft grey shade, this zambezi cloud perfect fit blind is practical and oh-so stylish. Add a soft splash of colour to your home with this grey blind, and accessories with wooden accessroies for a homey look. Using and easy clip-on fitting system, this perfect fit wooden blind is both drill and screw-free, and provides a child-safe option for your upvc windows or doors. At swift direct blinds quality is important to us, which is why your new perfect fit blind is hand-made with quality materials, in their yorkshire workshop by their team of experts, and delivered direct to your door.

products.title: Hive Blackout Barley Perfect Fit
products.description: Hive blackout barley perfect fit pleated blind. Part of their hive blackout range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. The "hiveblackout"range has a backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords through the fabric. Blackout fabric: yes. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame.

products.title: Trippy Nimbus - Roller Blind
products.description: The trippy nimbus is at the height of fashion right now, with its soft grey and funky chevron patterning, and offers a contemporary, up-to-date style that simply can't be matched. Use it for privacy without compromising on light, as this blind will filter it gently through. Use in a modern open living area, set against white walls and grey soft furnishings, with the occasional lime or orange accessory to add a pop of colour.

products.title: Innocence Mint - Roller Blind
products.description: The gentle fern patterning on the innocence in mint is eye-catching without being overpowering, and the soft, mint green backdrop is a beautifully subtle haze of colour that looks particularly pretty as the light filters through it. We all want to wake up to a bright, fresh room to start their morning, and the mint is perfect for helping to achieve that in the master bedroom. Alternatively, combine with whites and soft greys for a gentle, hushed look in the kitchen or dining room.

products.title: Innocence Wedgewood - Roller Blind
products.description: The innocence in wedgewood is a soft, sky blue fabric blind with off-white ferns scattered on top and a cool but homely feel. Light will gently filter through the fabric, giving a soft, mild glow to the room, and the simple rolling mechanism makes it durable and easy to use. Pair with off-white walls for a summery feel in the bedroom all year round, or use as a stand-alone window feature in a hallway or utility room.

products.title: Kolsva Deluxe Wengi - Venetian Blind
products.description: Transfix your guests with the distinguishing and dynamic kolsva deluxe in wengi, where bold sophistication meets classic, craftsman excellence. This dramatic, twilight shaded blind with coordinating supports and decorative trimmings, generates a demanding window arrangement with modern components and valuable utility. Fashion a creative master bedroom with striking characteristics and vivid colour by suspending the wengi against a vibrant teal background.

products.title: Kolsva Deluxe Sheesham - Venetian Blind
products.description: For a homely and convivial dcor scheme containing authentic, basswood timber and extra designer detail, elect the kolsva deluxe sheesham for its wholesome, conker shade. Sourced from sustainable forests, these craftsman-built, quality louvres, with matching supports and decorative ladders, produce a glamorous window dressing that is both conservational and convenient. Generate a luxury living space by corresponding the sheesham with similarly toned, deep furnishings, and walnut-hued flooring.

products.title: Zaragoza Enoki Marina - Roller Blind
products.description: Enoki marina combines a deep and inspirational blue with a vibrant pattern that's hard to define. The way it ebbs and flows across the fabric is perfect for when you want to express yourself, and yet it still retains that elegant touch of luxury modern decor is known for. If you like the way in which the blue shimmers in the light, why not add a similar crisp green to the mix to provide an elegant colour contrast? The two shades will then come together to create a light and positive space that you'll love to spend time in.

products.title: Ferns Inkwell - Roller Blind
products.description: A deep and moody blue is the inspiration behind this light and breezy fabric. The subtle shimmer and intricate stitching give the ferns a life of their own that makes you feel like a calming breeze is circulating in the room. Perfect for resting and relaxing as you put your feet up. Take a look at dark grassy greens if you want to create a natural colour combination that will live long in the memory.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe Monroe Bisque - Venetian Blind
products.description: When you want to rest and relax you need a blind that sits gently in the background and doesn't fight for your attention. The gentle colour of cotswold monroe bisque is perfect if you want to create a warm and welcoming atmosphere that flows naturally from your window space. Pairing monroe bisque with a matching rug in front of the fire and some contemporary canvas wall art is the perfect way to make your house a home.

products.title: Crosshatch Silver - Roller Blind
products.description: Crosshatch silver combines a classic geometric pattern with a striking silver that is sure to make a little noise. It's a pattern that seems to reverse depending on the angle of the light, and one which is finished with aplomb by the slightly blueish quality of the silver threads. Combining silver with a dark charcoal is a great way to emphasise the elegance of the shimmer. It's all about giving the threads the platform they need to speak for themselves, so don't be shy about organising your room with this purpose in mind.

products.title: Kolsva Deluxe Sycamore - Venetian Blind
products.description: Uniting practicality with elegance, the kolsva deluxe sycamore hosts modern, adjustable louvres with quality, and coordinating, decorative ladders. This authentic window dressing displays a natural, sun-kissed timber with comparable supports for traditional and tasteful style. Fashion a sophisticated and restful dcor in the boudoir, by embracing the sycamore with similarly toned furnishings and lushly textured wallpaper.

products.title: Ferns Sand - Roller Blind
products.description: Ferns in sand is the dreamy and relaxing fabric you have been searching for, and it's now available as a classic roller blind. The causal way in which the ferns twist and turn on the fabric, catching the light in different ways as they go is testament to the refined subtlety of the design. Transforming the guest bedroom used to be the job that would never end, but those days are now a thing of the past.

products.title: Zaragoza Enoki Oyster - Roller Blind
products.description: Zaragoza enoki oyster takes the traditional silver fabrics you will have seen for years and brings them right up to date in one fell swoop. The way in which it dances with the light serves to accentuate the vitality and energy of the patterning, and adds depth to your decor like never before. Inspiration can be found in the strangest of places, but that doesn't mean you should avoid the obvious sources.

products.title: Ferns Forest - Roller Blind
products.description: Ferns forest captures your imagination the moment you see it thanks to the tranquil green that works in harmony with the gentle shimmer of the threads. Each fern has a lifelike quality of its own that makes you feel as if a gentle breeze is moving subtly in the background. A deep aqua blue or a sandy brown would be perfect bedfellows for the forest green your new roller blinds bring to the table.

products.title: Karma Taupe - Roller Blind
products.description: If you are looking for a dark and moody colour that still adds some light and sparkle to your home, karma taupe could be just what you need. The background glistens and shimmers, making any space feel alive and energetic. And at the same time the matt finish of the trees give it a slightly sombre and tempered feel. A truly thought-provoking contrast. Take your time with taupe, and look to add matching patterns to your wallpaper and scatter cushions.

products.title: Ferns Snow - Roller Blind
products.description: As you stand back and contemplate whether to introduce ferns snow into your home take a minute to think about what you're seeing. The lightweight fabric works perfectly with the crisp white to make you feel at ease the moment you walk in the door. Plus you have the natural inspiration of the plant pattern underneath. It's simple decor at its finest. Take your room in an exciting creative direction by doing away with everything other than natural finishes and looks.

products.title: Ferns Gold - Roller Blind
products.description: Ferns in sand is the dreamy and relaxing fabric you have been searching for, and it's now available as a classic roller blind. The causal way in which the ferns twist and turn on the fabric, catching the light in different ways as they go is testament to the refined subtlety of the design. Transforming the guest bedroom used to be the job that would never end, but those days are now a thing of the past.

products.description: Cherry blossom, a brand new fabric for 2017, is a beautiful floral pattern which really compliments its surroundings, available in 2 natural soft colours. These patterned cream and blue curtains will look great in any room and add a touch of nature. products.title: Zap Paintbox Curtain
products.description: This grey retro-inspired patterened fabric features small splashes of colour with multi-coloured dots against the repeating pattern. This curtain is a great way to add subtle colour to a room with style. Add subbulent plants to the window to create a modern feel.
